text: [[img:icon_ogr_contracts]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Accept[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_contracts]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_contracts}}]]Contracts[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]issued by other good factions for military action against targeted characters and settlements in return for rewards and improved diplomatic relations with Contract issuers.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:ui/campaign ui/effect_bundles/cotw_transfer_settlement.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Grudgebringers can't occupy settlement. Instead, return the occupied settlement to other good factions for military aid and improved diplomatic relations.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_treasure_map]][[/img]] [[col:green]]You're the forces of right. Defeat the [[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_pieces_of_eight]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_pieces_of_eight}}]]foul creatures among the world[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and gain trust from the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_regiments_of_renown]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_regiments_of_renown}}]]Regiments of Renown.[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]Even if you happen to miss them, they'll give you another chance if you return the settlement to a good faction or complete the contract from the good faction.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Interact with the occasionally spawning marker to solve local's problems and earn financial rewards[[/col]]
